Tharwat Bassily (Copti: ⲥⲉⲣⲟⲩⲁⲧ ⲃⲁⲥⲓⲗⲓ) Ph.D., (14 Septemba 1940 - 5 Disemba 2017) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Egypt

Bassily gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba nke ọgwụ, Mahadum Cairo na 1967.[] Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Board of Amoun Pharmaceutical Company S.A.E., otu n'ime ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ na Egypt
Bassily bụkwa onye odeakwụkwọ nke Holy Synod nke Chọọchị Ọtọdọks nke Coptic, [Kpọpụta njehie: Closing </ref> missing for <ref> tag] na onye guzobere Coptic TV.
